entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
